metadata.title: CVE-2021-27548 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: There is a Null Pointer Dereference vulnerability in theXFAScanner::scanNode() function in XFAScanner.cc in xpdf 4.03.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
texlive-bin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
